explains: n. 雨篷；[建] 遮阳篷；甲板等上的天篷

sentences.en: The strengthening of Ji'nan awning construction site for electricity.
sentences.cn: 加强济南遮阳蓬施工现场的用电办理。

sentences.en: An elderly couple stood under a store awning on the edge of the tent village.
sentences.cn: 一对年老的夫妇站立在这个帐篷村边缘的一顶商店遮阳篷下。

sentences.en: Below these awning, there is a car park, an indoor athletics, baseball and cricket facility.
sentences.cn: 在这些遮阳篷下方，有一个停车场和室内田径、棒球、板球设施。
